name: Save Goodies
description:
Save goodies - clicker

Click, kill, collect coins, buy weapons, save goodies.

Features:

- 50 levels

- 40 kinds of enemies and 10 bosses

- 20 kinds of weapon

- 10 challenges

- 43 achievements

Collect coins, buy new weapons.

Unlock all achievements, get bonuses.

Collect enemy cards, become stronger.

Do not forget about energy.
